citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:30 pm on 09-
MAY-22. A household member stated the licensee would not return home until that evening.
End Section

Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.

MAY-22.  A household member stated the licensee would not return home until that evening.
